meanings.definition: A piece at the end of something, such as a musical instrument or a vehicle.
meanings.sent1: The tailpiece of the guitar holds the strings in place.
meanings.sent2: The car's tailpiece was damaged in the accident.
meanings.sent3: The tailpiece of the puzzle was finding the missing piece.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the perfect tailpiece to a wonderful evening.
meanings.sent5: The tailpiece of the story revealed the surprising twist.

meanings.definition: A conclusion or finishing touch to something.
meanings.sent1: The dessert was the perfect tailpiece to the delicious meal.
meanings.sent2: The final scene served as the tailpiece to the movie.
meanings.sent3: The tailpiece of the party was the unexpected fireworks display.
meanings.sent4: His speech was the tailpiece that left everyone inspired.
meanings.sent5: The tailpiece of the project was the successful presentation.

meanings.definition: A decorative or functional piece at the back of a piece of clothing.
meanings.sent1: The intricate lace tailpiece added elegance to the dress.
meanings.sent2: The tailpiece on the jacket featured a unique design.
meanings.sent3: The tailpiece on the shirt was a fun pop of color.
meanings.sent4: Her scarf served as a stylish tailpiece to her outfit.
meanings.sent5: The tailpiece on the hat completed the look perfectly.
